mapper.select: select * from itemboard ite inner Join store st on ite.STORE_NO = st.STORE_NO where email=#{email } and ite.DELETE_STATE = 0 order by ite.ITEMBOARD_NO
select * from itemboard ite inner join store st on ite.STORE_NO = st.STORE_NO where st.STORE_NAME=#{storeName } and ite.DELETE_STATE = 0 order by ite.ITEMBOARD_NO
select price from item where ITEM_NO=#{item_No }
select count(*) from fav where ITEMBOARD_NO = #{itemboard_No }
select count(*) from ITEM_QNA where ITEMBOARD_NO = #{itemboard_No }

select.if: select su.SUB_TITLE from category ca inner join category_sub su on ca.CATEGORY_NO = su.CATEGORY_NO where ca.category_no=(select CATEGORY_NO from CATEGORY where CATEGORY_TITLE = #{category_title })

mapper.insert: INSERT into item(item_no, price, amount, delivery_fee, delivery_state, item_state) values ( (select max(ITEM_NO) from item)+1, #{price }, #{amount }, #{delivery_Fee }, 1, #{item_State } )

INSERT into itemboard (sub_no, itemboard_date, local, title, itemboard_contents, tag, hits, recommend_ornot, change_ornot, item_no, itemboard_no, store_no, delete_state) values( (select sub_no from CATEGORY_SUB su inner join CATEGORY ma on su.CATEGORY_NO = ma.CATEGORY_NO where su.SUB_TITLE = #{sub_Title } and ma.CATEGORY_TITLE = #{category_Title } ), sysdate, #{local }, #{title }, #{itemboard_Contents }, #{tag }, 0, 0, #{change_Ornot }, (select max(ITEM_NO) from item), (select max(itemboard_no) from itemboard)+1, (select store_no from store where email = #{email }), 0 )
mapper.select: select count(ITEMBOARD_NO) from itemboard where STORE_NO = (select STORE_NO from store where email = #{email })
select count(ITEMBOARD_NO) from itemboard where STORE_NO = (select STORE_NO from store where STORE_NAME = #{storeName })
mapper.update: UPDATE itemboard set DELETE_STATE = 1 where ITEMBOARD_NO = #{itemboard_No }
mapper.select: select * from ITEMBOARD itb inner join item it on itb.ITEM_NO = it.ITEM_NO where itb.ITEM_NO = #{itemboard_No }
select * from CATEGORY ca inner join CATEGORY_SUB su on ca.CATEGORY_NO = su.CATEGORY_NO where su.SUB_NO= #{sub_no }
